mapper.insert: insert into staff ( staff_id, staff_pw,staff_department_no, staff_birth, staff_phone,staff_address, staff_grade, staff_medical_department, staff_name,staff_enroll_date ) values( #{staffId}, #{staffPw}, #{staffDepartmentNo}, #{staffBirth}, #{staffPhone}, #{staffAddress}, #{staffGrade}, #{staffMedicalDepartment}, #{staffName},#{staffEnrollDate} )
mapper.update: update staff set staff_department_no=#{staffDepartmentNo}, staff_birth=#{staffBirth}, staff_phone=#{staffPhone}, staff_adress=#{staffAddress}, staff_enroll_date=#{staffEnrollDate}, staff_state=#{staffState}, staff_grade=#{staffGrade}, staff_leave_cnt=#{staffLeaveCnt}, staff_day_off=#{staffDayOff} staff_medical_department=#{staffMedicalDepartment} where staff_id=#{staffId}
